objects.name: Analytic 0678
objects.description: Execution of Java-based or CLI database tools (e.g., DBeaver, Beekeeper, mysql, psql) from user profiles not tied to dev/admin roles, especially when followed by file writes and cloud sync activity. Defender correlates GUI tool launches, file write events in ~/Downloads or ~/Documents, and outbound API calls to known cloud services.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Process start of Java or native DB client tools

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Writes of .sql/.csv/.xlsx files to user documents/downloads

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: NSM:Flow
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: HTTPS API requests to Dropbox, iCloud, Google Drive, OneDrive shortly after DB tool usage

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: FQDNs of sync services used to detect likely outbound DB leakages
Whether to treat low-privilege users accessing DB tools as higher risk
